# deviceCapabilities

**Instance Property**

A protocol object that describes the nearby interaction capabilities of a person’s device.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var deviceCapabilities: any NIDeviceCapability { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDeviceCapability] instance this property returns to detect the available capabilities on a person’s device.
title: deviceCapabilities
